title: What are the elements of restorative justice? - Quora

response.answer_text: Faith that it works? or exists? I don’t know. What is justice in the first place? If I steal your thingy and I go to prison for years, how does that help your thingy? If I kill your relative and I get forever in prison, what does that do to you or your relative? As you can tell, I honestly don’t know.
Showing compassion towards the victims! Getting tough on criminals! Getting strong evidence to separate the not guilty from the guilty! Death sentence to those criminals with a horrible record!
